title: toxic yes banneble fuck no
body:
like wtf is this shit its my 3th time getting banned.I dont see any words exept r%%%%% that would be banneble its toxic yes but not banneble.And trolls just walk around but nooo they dont gett banned but you say r%%%%% once and u get ur 14 day ban.IF its truly that baaad just chat restrickt



Game 1
In-Game
pepega2: xhay
pepega2: i cant see them
pepega2: 2.5 min cc
pepega2: buddy
pepega2: r%%%%%
pepega2: so we lose gam,e thanks
pepega2: rpor ryze and ff
pepega2: 0/4
pepega2: 3 assists
pepega2: comvos not just blinfly use q
pepega2: i flame
pepega2: you trolll me
pepega2: what
pepega2: the achual fuck is that
pepega2: ad item?
pepega2: buddyy
pepega2: why diont you kill zed
pepega2: i would get triump
pepega2: i would kill grag
pepega2: bro learn to play
pepega2: 2/6 teaching me
pepega2: did you just type that teamfight
pepega2: every top game yes
pepega2: go look op.gg every game i play top i carry

replies.body:
You flamed all game, that is plenty. You dont just get banned for specific words, although randomly calling people r%%%%%s while also flaming all game is just a bonus.

The fact you progressed to a ban shows you cant control yourself or accept any responsibility, so you got removed. Have fun with that.

Please refrain from using pejorative language to insult others on the boards. Discussing it in the context of your chat is permissible, however. 

*Edit. *~~~~

Please refrain from using pejorative language and hate speech, both in the game and on the forums. 

I donâ€™t have any control over what happens to you in game, but will be suspending you from the forums due to this comment.
hardstuck gold go learn how to play and stop inting with teemo plase people like you are the reson why this game sucks.

> [{quoted}](name=pepega2,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=OqWhEs0Q,comment-id=,timestamp=2020-02-08T23:39:37.436+0000)
>
> its toxic yes but not banneble

Toxicity is bannable if you do it enough, which you do.
its one fucking game when u gett angry and thats banneble because some fuck dosent care and wants to lose and i call him r%%%%% while he is saying that im inting

> [{quoted}](name=pepega2,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=OqWhEs0Q,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2020-02-09T00:11:05.798+0000)
>
> its one fucking game when u gett angry and thats banneble because some fuck dosent care and wants to lose and i call him r%%%%% while he is saying that im inting

Yep.

I really love the people that come on the forums and actually try to defend obvious toxic behavior..

like they actually,  truly believe that they should be allowed to treat people like garbage.

Well, with your attitude and your unwillingness to change said immature attitude, you're on your way to a perma-ban. And you are on extremely thin ice at this point. ANY negativity or ANYTHING that could be taken as harassing another player or giving up or threatening another player (including "report X") WILL RESULT IN A PERMA BAN. You need to change NOW if you want to keep your account.
After your 25 day chat restriction, ANYTHING TOXIC will be punished. So as you said, toxic yes, had you hit 25 day chat restriction, yes, so ban yes.
i dint get chat restriction i just got 14 day ban if you such a fucking crybaby whats the poit.Its not fucking fun while someone is inting so calling them r%%%%% should be that bunisheble

Some people consider the R word to be hate speech. Hate speech is an instant 14 day ban.
And its not anyone else crying, its you throwing a baby fit over a video game. Someone is inting, so what? ignore them, report them if they're actually trolling (guess what, they usually aren't) and move on. The sooner you learn League isn't your life, the sooner you'll chill out and be able to actually keep your account. 

LEAGUE IS NOT LIFE OR DEATH. 

Oh...and if someone is actually trolling you, you calling them names is what they want. They want to be recognized for trolling. So if they're actually trolling and you call them names and yell and baby-rage at them...guess what! They win! and you lose your account, so you double lose, because you lost the game and you lost your account. What do they get? They lose their account, which they are 100% fine with because their entire purpose on that account was to troll.

So grow up.

>LEAGUE IS NOT LIFE OR DEATH.

In the context of your brain and amygdala it might as well be.
Well at least you know what toxic means.  Now on your 4th account just remember that toxic = bannable and you will be fine.
You are objectively wrong. Toxic? Subjective. Bannable? Objectively, yes. Want proof? Check why you were banned. Theres your proof.
